message: You're in your luteal phase (day 24). Focus on self-care and preparation. You're experiencing fatigue. Prioritize rest and recovery. We've detected some unusual patterns that need attention.

treat: Schedule a check-in with your healthcare provider

rationale: Based on your current cycle phase (luteal) and health state (fatigued), your body is preparing for potential pregnancy or menstruation. Fatigue may indicate need for additional rest and nutrition. Unusual patterns detected require closer monitoring. These recommendations are tailored to support your current phase and health state.

health_insights.title: Pattern Detection
health_insights.description: Unusual patterns detected - continue monitoring closely
